sentences.en: ...the nexus between the dominant class and the State.
Before he could respond, Ayenden's attention was drawn to a commotion atop the Nexus platform.
sentences.cn: 艾登还没来得及答话, 传送月台上忽然出现的骚动吸引了他.

sentences.en: If you want an Android phone right now, get a Nexus One.
sentences.cn: 如果你想现在入手一台Android手机, 买NexusOne吧.

sentences.en: In healthcare, the cash nexus undermines the doctor - patient relationship.
sentences.cn: 在医疗行业, 金钱有可能扭曲医务人员与患者之间应有的关系.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the government also played a certain role in the nexus.
sentences.cn: 同时, 这一部分也起到了一定的承上启下的作用.

sentences.en: Mr Penn is the very embodiment of the Washington - business nexus.
sentences.cn: 潘恩先生切实地体现了华府与商界的关系.

sentences.en: Nexus - information on refractive and cataract surgery, corneal topography and topographers.
sentences.cn: 屈光矫正,白内障手术, 角膜地形图的有关信息.

sentences.en: Shared ambition is the vital nexus between them.
sentences.cn: 共同的志向是把他们联结在一起的重要纽带.

sentences.en: The insertion of traditional shutters are super functional in moderating light & privacy, while also playfully further working the exploration of the traditional/contemporary nexus.
sentences.cn: 嵌入的传统百叶窗在调节光线和私密方面非常实用，同时也有趣地促进了对传统和现代结合的探索。

sentences.en: The nexus of poisons and terror is new. The nexus of Iraq and terror is old.
sentences.cn: 毒剂与恐怖的联系是个新的方式, 但伊拉克与恐怖的联系有长久的历史.

sentences.en: The Prayer Book has provided a flexible enough nexus of beliefs to hold together the different church parties.
sentences.cn: 祈祷书为各信仰之间建起了足够灵活的联系纽带，以期将各个不同教派凝聚在一起。

sentences.en: The relation between a subject and its predicate is sometimes called a nexus.
sentences.cn: 主语与其谓语的关系有时也称为“组连”.

sentences.en: This paper presents some research works on the law? finance nexus.
sentences.cn: 本文旨在对法与金融关系的研究成果作一简单梳理.

sentences.en: To a growing group of information war technologists, it is the nexus of fantasy and reality.
sentences.cn: 对一组成长的信息战专家, 它是幻想和现实的连结.

sentences.en: Torso Action: the backbone of the body trunk, nexus, connecting his head and limbs.
sentences.cn: 躯干动作: 躯干是人体的支柱, 承上启下, 连接着头及四肢.

sentences.en: White theme designed by Livid, this blog is proudly powered by Project Nexus.

trans.tran_cn: （事物、思想等之间的）联结，联系，关系
trans.tran_en: a connection or network of connections between a number of people, things, or ideas
